text: The women's 200 metres event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 15 and 16 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Shalonda Solomon ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Anneisha McLaughlin ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Nickesha Anderson ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 July Wind: -0.2m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
